skills.name: Sequential Thinking
skills.usage: Complex project planning, breaking down tasks, reflective problem-solving
skills.whenToUse: Any complex task requiring multi-step analysis
skills.example: Planning the architecture of a new application

skills.name: Desktop Commander
skills.usage: All file operations, terminal commands, data analysis, file search

skills.name: Context7 / Memory
skills.usage: Documentation lookup, SDK references, knowledge graph management
skills.whenToUse: Need current documentation or to store/retrieve project context

skills.name: Web Search
skills.whenToUse: Information beyond knowledge cutoff or needs verification

skills.name: Web Fetch
skills.usage: Retrieve full webpage content from specific URLs

skills.name: Google Drive Search
skills.usage: Search internal documents, project files, company data
skills.whenToUse: Need to find internal documents or personal files

skills.name: Google Drive Fetch
skills.usage: Retrieve specific Google Docs by ID
skills.whenToUse: Have a specific Google Doc URL to read

skills.name: Read and Write Apple Notes
skills.usage: Access Apple Notes for quick reference and storage

skills.name: GitHub
skills.usage: Repository management, code collaboration, version control
skills.whenToUse: Need to interact with GitHub repos, create branches, PRs

skills.name: Puppeteer
skills.whenToUse: Need to interact with websites programmatically

skills.name: Fetch Tool
